prompt: What are some free AI tools for audio transcription?

hidden_queries: free AI tools for audio transcription
free audio transcription tools AI free options

sources.title: 10 Best Free AI Transcription Tools for Fast & Accurate Transcripts
sources.snippet: Explore 10 best free AI transcription tools to convert speech to text quickly and accurately, featuring top software for real-time and on-demand transcription.

sources.title: 12 Best Free Transcription Software Options for 2025
sources.snippet: Whether you're a journalist on a deadline, a researcher analyzing hours of audio, or a professional looking to streamline your workflow, the right tool can be a game-changer. But with countless options available, how do you find the best free transcription software that delivers accuracy without compromising your privacy or budget?

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are some genuinely free (or freemium) AI-powered tools you can use for audio transcription. Most let you convert speech to text without paying, though limits (minutes, features) vary by service: Maestra AI+1
Free/Web-based Tools FreeAudioTranscribe (Whisper-powered) – Browser-based, private transcription of audio/video files with timestamps, no account needed. Audio Transcriber
TurboScribe Free AI Transcription – Upload audio/video for quick AI transcription in 100+ languages; exports text and subtitles. TurboScribe
Soundwise.ai – Unlimited free browser transcription with broad format support. Soundwise
Riverside Transcription – Free audio/video transcription in many languages directly in the browser. Riverside
Deepgram Free Transcription – Free online tool to convert conversations, YouTube clips, and files into text. Deepgram
Restream Audio-to-Text – Browser tool that converts audio/video to text quickly (free single transcription). Restream
Free Plans or Freemium Services Otter.ai (Free tier) – Real-time and uploaded file transcription with searchable/editable transcripts. Otter.ai
